document_title: Correction to “Adaptation to full weight‐bearing following disuse in rats: The impact of biological sex on musculoskeletal recovery”
summary_full: This document is a correction to a previously published article in Physiological Reports. It addresses a typographical error in the spelling of the second author's name, Megan E. Rosa-Caldwell. The correction has been applied to the online version of the article. The authors apologize for the error.
key_findings: The second author's name was misspelled in the original publication.
The correct spelling of the second author's name is Megan E. Rosa-Caldwell.
The correction has been implemented in the online version of the article.
conclusions: The correction ensures the accurate attribution of authorship for the original research article.
impact_statement: This correction ensures the accurate representation of authorship in a scientific publication concerning musculoskeletal recovery in rats.
